thread.title: Supergirl, Arrow, Legends of Tomorrow and The Flash Got LEGO-fied End Cards
thread.title_full: Supergirl, Arrow, Legends of Tomorrow and The Flash Got LEGO-fied End Cards

author: Jay Jayson
title: Supergirl, Arrow, Legends of Tomorrow and The Flash Got LEGO-fied End Cards
text:
Supergirl, Arrow, Legends of Tomorrow and The Flash Got LEGO-fied End Cards Jay Jayson Back to Article Image of 
Leading up to The LEGO Batman Movie release this weekend — which brought in $14.6 million on Friday and is expected to win the Valentine's Day box office with $54.5 million — Warner Bros. TV released LEGO-fied images of the characters from Supergirl , The Flash, Legends of Tomorrow , Arrow and Gotham , as well as a humorous TV spot in which LEGO Batman (Will Arnett) met the LEGO-fied versions of Supergirl (Melissa Benoist), The Flash (Grant Gustin), Arrow (Stephen Amell), and Atom (Brandon Routh). 
Plus, If you happened to watch The CW's DC superhero shows shows this past week to their entirety, you would have also noticed that each of their end cards were LEGO-fied. Check them out in the video above. 
In the irreverent spirit of fun that made The LEGO Movie a worldwide phenomenon, the self-described leading man of that ensemble – LEGO Batman – stars in his own big-screen adventure. But there are big changes brewing in Gotham, and if he wants to save the city from The Joker’s hostile takeover, Batman may have to drop the lone vigilante thing, try to work with others and maybe, just maybe, learn to lighten up. 
MORE: LEGO Batman, John Wick, Fifty Shades Battle At The Box Office / LEGO Batman Meets CW's Arrowverse In TV Spot / Gotham, Arrow, The Flash, Supergirl and WBTV Go LEGO for LEGO Batman Movie Release ---
